description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $847.0K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with 9034 3476 Quebec. The average
  contract duration was 1.79 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $511.8K. The longest
  contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.1M.
lookup_name: '9034 3476 QUEBEC'

s431_number_of_contracts: '10'

s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '105%'

s421_mean_contract_value: '511.8K'
s425_max_duration: '5'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.1M'
